scripts.create-dirs: mkdirp dist/assets/js && mkdirp dist/assets/css && mkdirp dist/views
scripts.copy-files: copyfiles -u 2 public/assets/images/**/* dist/assets && copyfiles -u 2 public/assets/fonts/* dist/assets
scripts.start: npm run create-dirs && npm run copy-files && npm run uglify && npm run minify && node server.js
